user_persona: A local community researcher exploring different neighborhoods.
user_goal: To select a neighborhood on the map and view its name in a tooltip.

narrative_steps.title: Opening the Map
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the app and sees the full-screen interactive map with various neighborhoods outlined.
narrative_steps.action: Load the application and observe the map interface.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The map loads successfully with neighborhood boundaries visible and an ivory background with forest green controls.

narrative_steps.title: Hovering Over a Neighborhood
narrative_steps.description: Sarah moves her cursor over a neighborhood polygon to preview its name.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a neighborhood area on the map.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears above the polygon showing the area's name without selecting it.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Neighborhood
narrative_steps.description: Sarah clicks on the neighborhood she is interested in to select it for further analysis.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a neighborhood polygon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The neighborhood boundary is highlighted in forest green, and a tooltip with the area name is displayed.

user_persona: A policy analyst comparing age demographics across districts.
user_goal: To switch between demographic tabs and view updated charts.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Demographic Panel
narrative_steps.description: After selecting two neighborhoods, Mark looks at the demographic comparison panel next to the map.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the demographic comparison section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A panel with demographic category tabs (Age Distribution, Gender Ratio, etc.) appears on the right side of the map.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Age Distribution Chart
narrative_steps.description: Mark wants to start with age distribution and clicks the corresponding tab.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Age Distribution' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart updates to display a bar graph comparing the age distributions of the selected neighborhoods using forest green elements.

narrative_steps.title: Switching to Another Category
narrative_steps.description: Curious about gender ratios, Mark switches to another demographic category.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Gender Ratio' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chart now shows a comparison of gender ratios for the same neighborhoods.

user_persona: An urban planner assessing economic health across regions.
user_goal: To analyze employment rates and housing prices for selected areas.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Economic Metrics
narrative_steps.description: Lisa selects three neighborhoods and goes to the economic data dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Open the economic metrics tabbed interface within the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tabs for Income, Employment, Housing Prices, and Business Density appear with default charts loaded.

narrative_steps.title: Examining Employment Rates
narrative_steps.description: She focuses first on employment statistics by clicking the appropriate tab.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Employment' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Charts comparing employment rates among selected neighborhoods are displayed with forest green bars on an ivory background.

narrative_steps.title: Comparing Housing Prices
narrative_steps.description: Next, Lisa compares average housing prices between the same neighborhoods.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Housing Prices' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Updated charts reflect housing price comparisons for the selected areas.

user_persona: A safety officer reviewing crime trends in city zones.
user_goal: To toggle a crime heatmap and compare statistical data visually.

narrative_steps.title: Activating Crime Heatmap
narrative_steps.description: Officer Jenkins wants to visualize overall crime density across the city.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Toggle Crime Heatmap' button in the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A heatmap overlay appears on the map indicating crime density patterns.

narrative_steps.title: Analyzing Numerical Data
narrative_steps.description: Jenkins then checks numerical breakdowns of crimes in specific neighborhoods.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the statistical crime data panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Panels show numerical comparisons of total crimes, violent crimes, and property crimes with forest green text/icons.

user_persona: A data analyst customizing their workspace for efficiency.
user_goal: To rearrange dashboard widgets for better workflow organization.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Initial Layout
narrative_steps.description: Alex logs in and views the preloaded dashboard with several chart widgets arranged in a grid.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the initial dashboard layout with draggable/resizable chart widgets.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Widgets like demographic pie charts, economic trend lines, and crime bar graphs are present with forest green borders on ivory backgrounds.

narrative_steps.title: Dragging a Widget
narrative_steps.description: Wanting to group related charts together, Alex drags one widget to a new position.
narrative_steps.action: Drag and drop a chart widget to reposition it within the dashboard grid.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The widget smoothly moves to the desired location while maintaining its size and interactivity.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing a Chart
narrative_steps.description: To get a clearer look at a complex chart, Alex decides to make it bigger.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the widget's settings menu and choose to resize it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected chart expands to occupy more space, improving readability.

user_persona: A frequent user who prefers a focused view during presentations.
user_goal: To apply a predefined layout and save it for future use.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Layout Settings
narrative_steps.description: During preparation for a meeting, Jordan clicks the gear icon to open layout customization options.
narrative_steps.action: Click the gear icon in the top toolbar to access layout settings.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A settings panel slides out with thumbnails of layout templates and a 'Save Current Layout' button.

narrative_steps.title: Applying a Template
narrative_steps.description: Jordan chooses the 'Focus Mode' template to highlight key metrics.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Focus Mode' thumbnail.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The dashboard immediately rearranges itself into the selected focus-oriented layout.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Custom Configuration
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the setup, Jordan saves this version for later reuse.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Save Current Layout' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The customized layout is saved under Jordan’s profile and can be recalled anytime.

requirement_tested: User interface with ivory background color
user_persona: A designer evaluating visual consistency across the platform.
user_goal: To verify that all interface sections maintain the specified ivory tone.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Main Interface Areas
narrative_steps.description: Taylor reviews the homepage, dashboard, and modal windows to ensure visual uniformity.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate through main pages and inspect background colors.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All sections, including modals and panels, display a solid ivory (#FFFFF0) background.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Modal Dialogs
narrative_steps.description: Taylor opens a filter modal to confirm it follows the same background rule.
narrative_steps.action: Trigger a modal dialog (e.g., by opening the filter panel).
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Modal overlays also feature the global ivory fill color.

user_persona: A UX reviewer checking branding adherence.
user_goal: To confirm that all interactive elements use the correct forest green theme.

narrative_steps.title: Evaluating Buttons and Controls
narrative_steps.description: Megan inspects primary buttons, toggles, and active navigation items throughout the app.
narrative_steps.action: Visit various parts of the app and locate interactive components.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All buttons, toggles, checkboxes, and highlighted chart elements are styled with forest green (#228B22).

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Chart Axes and Highlights
narrative_steps.description: Megan specifically examines charts to verify axis labeling and highlighted points match the brand palette.
narrative_steps.action: Examine chart widgets for styling of axes, labels, and data point highlights.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Axes, tick marks, and important data highlights use forest green consistently.

user_persona: A real estate agent targeting high-income neighborhoods.
user_goal: To narrow down visible neighborhoods based on income range.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Filter Sidebar
narrative_steps.description: Emma clicks on the filter icon to reveal filtering options.
narrative_steps.action: Click the filter toggle to open the vertical sidebar panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A collapsible filter panel with groups for Population, Income, and Crime appears on the left side of the map.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Income Threshold
narrative_steps.description: Emma adjusts the income slider to only show affluent areas.
narrative_steps.action: Drag the income range sliders to set a higher minimum value.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Neighborhood markers on the map dynamically update to reflect only those within the selected income bracket.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Additional Filters
narrative_steps.description: Emma adds a population size constraint to refine her search even more.
narrative_steps.action: Expand the Population filter group and adjust the slider accordingly.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Map updates again, showing only neighborhoods that meet both income and population criteria.

requirement_tested: Data visualization tools for trend analysis
user_persona: A sociologist studying long-term demographic shifts.
user_goal: To track population growth trends over multiple years.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Trend Analysis Tab
narrative_steps.description: Dr. Lee navigates to the Trends tab after selecting several neighborhoods.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Trends' tab in the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Multi-year line graphs appear, depicting changes in key metrics per selected neighborhood.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Population Growth
narrative_steps.description: Lee starts by examining how populations have changed over time.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Population Growth' metric selector.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Line graphs representing population evolution for each selected area are displayed in forest green.

narrative_steps.title: Switching Metrics
narrative_steps.description: Curious about economic impact, Lee switches to income change trends.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Income Change' metric option.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Graphs now illustrate fluctuations in median household incomes over the years.

user_persona: A project manager preparing a stakeholder presentation.
user_goal: To generate and download a PDF report summarizing current comparisons.

narrative_steps.title: Preparing Final Selections
narrative_steps.description: Before exporting, Morgan ensures all necessary data is selected and displayed.
narrative_steps.action: Finalize neighborhood selections and configure dashboard views.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chosen datasets and charts are ready for inclusion in the export.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Export Process
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clicks the floating export button to begin creating a shareable document.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Export Report' floating action button at the bottom-right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal dialog prompts Morgan to choose between PDF or CSV formats.

narrative_steps.title: Downloading the Report
narrative_steps.description: Morgan selects PDF and waits for the file to generate and download.
narrative_steps.action: Choose PDF format and click 'Export'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A formatted PDF report is generated and automatically downloaded to Morgan’s device.

user_persona: A returning user accessing personal settings.
user_goal: To log in and navigate to saved preferences and layouts.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Into Account
narrative_steps.description: Returning user Riley clicks the sign-in link to access personalized features.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Sign In' link in the top navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An authentication modal appears with fields for entering credentials.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Credentials
narrative_steps.description: Riley enters their registered email and password.
narrative_steps.action: Input valid login credentials and submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Authentication succeeds, and Riley is redirected to their dashboard with a welcome message.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Profile Information
narrative_steps.description: Now logged in, Riley checks their saved settings and favorite neighborhoods.
narrative_steps.action: Click the user avatar/profile link in the top navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Profile page loads, displaying saved layouts, preferences, and recently viewed areas.

user_persona: A visitor looking up a known neighborhood quickly.
user_goal: To find and center the map on a specific district using search.

narrative_steps.title: Using Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Jamie recalls the name of a district and uses the search function to find it.
narrative_steps.action: Type a partial neighborhood name into the search textbox near the top of the map.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Autocomplete suggestions appear below the input field in a dropdown list.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suggestion
narrative_steps.description: Jamie sees the correct result in the suggestions and clicks it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the matching neighborhood name from the autocomplete dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The map centers on the selected neighborhood, and it is automatically selected with a highlighted border.

user_persona: A city official monitoring live incident reports.
user_goal: To observe automatic updates in displayed data as new information arrives.

narrative_steps.title: Monitoring Active Connection
narrative_steps.description: While viewing a dashboard, Officer Patel notices a subtle pulse indicating real-time connectivity.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the status indicator beside the header logo during normal operation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A small pulsing dot confirms an active WebSocket connection to live data feeds.

narrative_steps.title: Responding to New Data
narrative_steps.description: Suddenly, a spike in reported incidents occurs nearby, causing immediate UI adjustments.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for incoming WebSocket event reflecting updated crime data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Charts and map markers refresh instantly to reflect the latest incident reports.

requirement_tested: Responsive design for multiple device types
user_persona: A mobile user conducting field research on-site.
user_goal: To seamlessly interact with the application on a smartphone screen.

narrative_steps.title: Loading App on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: Researcher Casey accesses the app on their phone while walking through a neighborhood.
narrative_steps.action: Open the web application on a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interface adapts to fit the smaller screen with stacked panels and touch-friendly controls.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Collapsed Menus
narrative_steps.description: Casey taps the hamburger menu to access hidden filters and tools.
narrative_steps.action: Tap the hamburger menu icon typically located in the top-left or right corner.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sidebars and filter panels slide in smoothly, preserving ivory backgrounds and forest green accents.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Responsive Dashboard Widgets
narrative_steps.description: Despite limited space, Casey finds that dashboard widgets scale appropriately.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll through dashboard content and resize browser window to simulate mobile constraints.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Widgets remain readable and functional, adapting to vertical stacking on smaller screens.
